title: PDF to Word
description: Convert PDF files to editable Word (DOCX) format
placeholder: Drag & drop PDF files or click to upload...

instructions.title: How to use PDF to Word Converter

steps.title: Upload your PDF files
steps.description: Drag and drop up to 10 PDF files into the upload area, or click to browse and select files from your computer. Each file can be up to 100MB in size.

steps.title: Configure conversion options
steps.description: Choose your conversion mode (Preserve Layout, Fluid Text, or Text Only), select image quality, and decide whether to include images in the output document.

steps.title: Convert your files
steps.description: Click the Convert button to start the conversion process. You'll see real-time progress for each file, including estimated time remaining and conversion status.

steps.title: Download Word documents
steps.description: Once conversion is complete, download individual files or use the Download All button for batch downloads. Review conversion quality metrics and any warnings before using the documents.

features: Convert up to 10 PDF files simultaneously
Extract and include images from PDFs
Multiple conversion modes for different use cases
Adjustable image quality for file size optimization
Conversion quality rating for each file
Completely secure - all processing happens in your browser
No file size limits for browser-based conversion
Support for text-based and scanned PDFs
useCases: Edit PDF documents by converting to editable Word format
Extract text and images from PDF files for reuse
Convert contracts and agreements for editing and signing
Prepare presentation materials from PDF sources
Migrate legacy PDF documents to modern formats
Extract data from PDF reports for analysis
Create templates from existing PDF documents
Convert academic papers for collaborative editing
proTips: Use Preserve Layout mode for documents with complex formatting like tables and columns
Choose Text Only mode if you plan to heavily reorganize the content
Lower image quality reduces file size without significant visual impact
Text-based PDFs convert better than scanned/image-only PDFs
Convert password-protected PDFs by removing the password first
Process large files in smaller batches for better performance
troubleshooting: No text extracted: PDF may be image-based or scanned - consider using OCR tools first
Poor formatting: Try different conversion modes or manually adjust in Word
Missing images: Enable 'Include Images' option in conversion settings
Conversion failed: File may be corrupted, password-protected, or use unsupported features
Large file size: Lower image quality or remove images for smaller output files
Slow conversion: Large or complex PDFs take longer - be patient or split the file

meta.title: PDF to Word Converter - Free Online PDF to DOCX Tool | ToolsLab
meta.description: Convert PDF to Word (DOCX) online for free. Preserve formatting, extract images, and edit PDFs easily. Supports batch conversion up to 10 files. 100% secure browser-based conversion.

tagline: Convert PDF files to editable Word documents with preserved formatting and images
pageDescription: Transform PDF files into editable Word (DOCX) documents while preserving original formatting, layout, and images. Perfect for editing contracts, extracting content, converting reports, and preparing documents for collaboration. Supports multiple conversion modes, batch processing up to 10 files, and adjustable image quality. Free, secure browser-based conversion with no file uploads or server storage. Works with both text-based and scanned PDFs.

suspended.title: Service Temporarily Unavailable
suspended.description: We're sorry, but the PDF to Word conversion service has been temporarily suspended.
suspended.whyDescription: This tool requires a dedicated paid server to perform high-quality PDF to Word conversions. The server is owned and operated by us, but the hosting costs have become unsustainable. We've had to temporarily suspend the service until we can cover these expenses.
suspended.helpDescription: Your support can help us cover the server costs and reactivate this service. Every contribution, no matter how small, makes a difference.
suspended.thanks: Thank you for your understanding and support!
